owner.name: Wilson Udomisor
owner.title: Data science that turns messy data into clear insight and confident action
owner.proofLine: You want answers you can trust, not buzzwords. I build simple, reliable data pipelines from raw data to real decisions. This portfolio showcases practical work with Python, SQL, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Spark, dbt, Airflow, and Power BIâ€”all focused on helping you understand what is happening, why it is happening, and what you should do next.
